commentBody:
The real life Doctor portrayed by Will Smith in "Concussion", Bennett Omalu, recently said he would "bet his medical license" that OJ has CTE.

If that is indeed the case, it would explain a lot: multiple episodes of spousal abuse on both wives and the brutal murders of Nicole Brown and Ronald Goldman.

And.....once again if OJ does have CTE it is all the more reason he should remain incarcerated as he would be a continuing threat to society.
